name: Ring them well
description:
Short puzzle game developed in 6 hours for the Aard Jam 2. 

Rotate the bells on the board by clicking on them.

If bells are facing each other, it is an invalid move.

Arrange the bells in order so that every bell will ring.

Click play and check your result.

Enjoy

credits
